name: Mismagius GL LV.X
author: Kent Kanetsuna

poke_power.name: Magical Return
poke_power.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may return a Pokémon Tool or Technical Machine card attached to your Pokémon to your hand. This power can’t be used if Mismagius GL is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Darkness Magic
attacks.effect: Count the number of cards in your hand. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokémon. You can’t put more than 8 damage counters in this way.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Mismagius GL. Mismagius GL LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
